column5: Got out for 4 hours with the son this evening to experiment with some jigs we've been making. What a blast. In addition to a few OOS visitors, the crappie were on fire.     We be havin dee beeg feast tomorrow.
You're the older guy? I always thought you were your son from that fishing with hammercarp thread...
Fantastic Bruce!  thats a feast!  Good job....i still aint found them here yet.  Must be satisfying to get 'em on your home made jigs.
Sure,sure Bruce get the motherload of panfish when I don't get out with ya one day.
I like that kind of local fishing. Those are white crappie not the black crappie found most other places.
Someone's going to be having a great meal or two WTG Bruce You must be pleased about catching those on your own rig Great job you guys!!! Jacques
Couldn't you tell from the self portrait in my avatar?
They don't go far when feeding 4. Them 2 dogs are  real porkers when it comes to eating fish
That's awesome. Gonna have to get my little guy over there at some point soon.
Well done Bruce. Looks like the sink in your new place is going to see just as many fish as your last residence.  Thx for sharing and enjoy the fish fry.
What Your Catching Them From The River?  Man Toronto Sucks Arse For Fishing.
Only to the inexperienced urban fisher.
As what limey said.And I cant wait to see what will nibble on those spinners.Thanks bruce and rob!Maybe a little pic to go with a pic one day,LOL.
I lived in TO for 20 years and I know there is good fishing to be found. Just have to do the legwork.
I got coaxed into having another kick at the can tonight. I just can't turn down such temptations.
Rob never looks too happy, even when he's got fish.   He should take some pointers from his old man and the avatar and smile once in a while.
